snippet: As health and safety concerns become increasingly pronounced, the divergent points of view on whether to allow children to play football reflect intensifying debates on the issue.
abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column notes that as health and safety concerns in football become increasingly pronounced, the divergent points of view on whether to allow children to play football reflect intensifying debates on the issue.
lead_paragraph: As health and safety concerns become increasingly pronounced, the divergent points of view on whether to allow children to play football reflect intensifying debates on the issue.

headline.main: Football’s Future Rests on Parents as Much as Players
headline.print_headline: Football’s Future Rests on Parents as Much as Players
